thread.section_title: PaintYourLife.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PaintYourLife.com | www.paintyourlife.com
thread.title: Bentonville AR customer
thread.title_full: PaintYourLife.com reviewed by Bentonville AR customer

author: Bentonville AR customer
title: Bentonville AR customer
text: We commissioned a painting from a single photograph of our family pet. The detail and care taken to create our oil was outstanding. The communication between the artist (company) and the buyer was professional and greatly appreciated. The end result was beyond expectations. The painting is proudly displayed in our home. A 5 star rating for this company.
